headline: Realty Income (NYSE:O) Declares 661st Monthly Dividend of US$3.23 Per Share
summary: Realty Income (NYSE:O) recently affirmed its 661st consecutive monthly dividend, highlighting its consistent commitment to shareholder returns with a dividend of $0.269 per share. Over the past quarter, Realty Income's share price rose by 7%, a performance that aligns with the wider market upswing. Despite this, the company's downward revision of earnings guidance for 2025 may have countered broader market optimism. Meanwhile, steady dividend increases and substantial debt financing...
